about_the_game:
Welcome Morpi Keeper to the fast-paced card game you were waiting for!
Say goodbye to turns, think fast, and play the cards in your favor.


Summon Morpis
Meet your trusty and silly companions, the Morpis, ready to aid you in your battles
They may seem weak, but morpis can get stronger!

Play Cards
Empower your Morpis with powerful skills by playing your cards strategically
Fireballs! Toxic attacks! Healing priest! A morpi VAMPIRE!?

Defend your morpis
Play action cards to help your morpis in the battle
Freeze enemies to get some time! Or maybe heal wounded morpis!

Build your deck
Gather coins to expand your card collection
Your morpis may need special skills to help you get coins fast
